com.squareup.picasso

Class OkHttp3Downloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.picasso.OkHttp3Downloader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Downloader

    public final class OkHttp3Downloader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Downloader
    A Downloader which uses OkHttp to download images.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OkHttp3Downloader(Call.Factory client)
      Create a new downloader that uses the specified Call.Factory instance.

      Create new downloader that uses OkHttp.

      Create new downloader that uses OkHttp.

      Create a new downloader that uses the specified OkHttp instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response load(Request request)
      Download the specified image url from the internet.
      void shutdown()
      Allows to perform a clean up for this Downloader including closing the disk cache and other resources.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(android.content.Context context)
        Create new downloader that uses OkHttp. This will install an image cache into your application cache directory.

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(java.io.File cacheDir)
        Create new downloader that uses OkHttp. This will install an image cache into the specified directory.
        Parameters:
        cacheDir - The directory in which the cache should be stored

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(android.content.Context context,
                         long maxSize)
        Create new downloader that uses OkHttp. This will install an image cache into your application cache directory.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - The size limit for the cache.

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(java.io.File cacheDir,
                         long maxSize)
        Create new downloader that uses OkHttp. This will install an image cache into the specified directory.
        Parameters:
        cacheDir - The directory in which the cache should be stored
        maxSize - The size limit for the cache.

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(OkHttpClient client)
        Create a new downloader that uses the specified OkHttp instance. A response cache will not be automatically configured.

      • OkHttp3Downloader

        public OkHttp3Downloader(Call.Factory client)
        Create a new downloader that uses the specified Call.Factory instance.
